directions: Blend honeydew melon, cucumber, onion, avocado, jalapeno pepper, garlic, white balsamic vinegar, lime juice, salt, and black pepper in a blender until smooth. Adjust seasonings if desired and chill before serving.
ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and coarsely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Green Gazpacho
